alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 1:57PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From Noon Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. This will affect I-25 at Raton Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
